Interface Condition<T>

The Condition interface defines all existing query filters

Type parameters

  • T: Entity

Hierarchy

  • Condition
    • Filter
    • Builder

between

  • between(field: string, greaterValue: number | string | Date | Entity, lessValue: number | string | Date | Entity): Filter<T>
    • Defined in lib/query/Condition.ts:90

    Adds a between filter to the field. This is a shorthand for an less than and greater than filter.

    Parameters

    • field: string

      The field to filter

    • greaterValue: number | string | Date | Entity

      The field value must be greater than this value

    • lessValue: number | string | Date | Entity

      The field value must be less than this value

    Returns Filter<T>

    The resulting Query

matches

  • matches(field: string, regExp: string | RegExp): Filter<T>
    • Defined in lib/query/Condition.ts:190

    Adds a regular expression filter to the field

    The field value must matches the regular expression.

    Note: Only anchored expressions (Expressions that starts with an ^) and the multiline flag are supported.

    see

    http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/operator/query/regex/

    Parameters

    • field: string

      The field to filter

    • regExp: string | RegExp

      The regular expression of the filter

    Returns Filter<T>

    The resulting Query

mod

  • mod(field: string, divisor: number, remainder: number): Filter<T>
    • Defined in lib/query/Condition.ts:176

    Adds a modulo filter to the field

    The field value divided by divisor must be equal to the remainder.

    see

    http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/operator/query/mod/

    Parameters

    • field: string

      The field to filter

    • divisor: number

      The divisor of the modulo filter

    • remainder: number

      The remainder of the modulo filter

    Returns Filter<T>

    The resulting Query

near

  • near(field: string, geoPoint: GeoPoint, maxDistance: number): Filter<T>
    • Defined in lib/query/Condition.ts:218

    Adds a geopoint based near filter to the GeoPoint field

    The GeoPoint must be within the maximum distance to the given GeoPoint. Returns from nearest to farthest.

    see

    http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/operator/query/nearSphere/

    Parameters

    • field: string

      The field to filter

    • geoPoint: GeoPoint

      The GeoPoint to filter

    • maxDistance: number

      Tha maximum distance to filter in meters

    Returns Filter<T>

    The resulting Query

    • Defined in lib/query/Condition.ts:203

    The collection must have exactly size members.

    see

    http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/operator/query/size/

      The field to filter

    • size: number

    • Defined in lib/query/Condition.ts:18

    An object that contains filter rules which will be merged with the current filters of this query

    Parameters

      Additional filters for this query

    Returns Filter<T>

withinPolygon

  • withinPolygon(field: string, ...geoPoints: GeoPoint[] | GeoPoint[][]): Filter<T>
    • Defined in lib/query/Condition.ts:231

    Adds a GeoPoint based polygon filter to the GeoPoint field

    The GeoPoint must be contained within the given polygon.

    see

    http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/operator/query/geoWithin/

    Parameters

    • field: string

      The field to filter

    • Rest ...geoPoints: GeoPoint[] | GeoPoint[][]

      The geoPoints that describes the polygon of the filter

    Returns Filter<T>

    The resulting Query
